title: I need help...
body:
I've paid 100 dollars but i dont recieve RP points... 
I once got the email, but then it was deleted automatically...

replies.body:
Hey Mirror,

Our servers have been under a lot of stress lately from the new content purchases going on, which has caused some weird behavior with RP purchases. Not to worry, if you reach out to our billing specialists [through a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), we'll be able to work with you to resolve this.

Let me know if you have any additional questions!
